configuration.name: training_disrupt
configuration.value: The disruption date must be after the intake date for this training.

configuration.name: training_resume
configuration.value: The resumption date must be after the disruption date.

configuration.name: license_date
configuration.value: The end date must be after the start date.

configuration.name: registration_date
configuration.value: The registration date must be after the application date.

configuration.name: exam_date
configuration.value: The exam date must be after the application date.

configuration.name: training_program
configuration.value: You must select a Cadre from Trained in Country or Trained outside the Country

configuration.name: training_out_country
configuration.value: You must select the Country where training was received.

configuration.name: training_graduation_req
configuration.value: This field is required when you selected training outside the country.

configuration.name: training_graduation_date
configuration.value: The graduation date must be after the intake date.

configuration.name: pp_date
configuration.value: The end date must be after the start date.

configuration.name: disp_date
configuration.value: The reinstatement date must be after the initial action date.

configuration.name: disp_date
configuration.value: The Reinstatement Date should be after the Disciplinary Action Date.

configurationGroup.name: search_reports
configurationGroup.description: A list of all reports that need to be generated for the search page. If the value is true then the report will be generated even if other report generation is turned off by /modules/CustomReports/times/background.

configuration.name: search_people
configuration.value: description:Locate any person's record in the system to review, print or update.

configuration.name: search_training
configuration.value: description:Locate any person's record in the system by training information. A person may appear multiple times if they have multiple trainings.

configurationGroup.name: recent_forms
configurationGroup.description: A list of forms to display in the recent form list with details.

configuration.name: fields
configuration.displayName: The fields to display in the results

configuration.name: display

configuration.description: A printf string that matches the order of the fields for this form.
